br.ufrj.ct.ruadmin

Class API

  • java.lang.Object
    • br.ufrj.ct.ruadmin.API

  • public class API
extends java.lang.Object
    Created by Felipe Podolan Oliveira on 30/07/17. This class is responsible for making the calls to the RU API using the Volley HTTP library. Each method represents a different route of the API and the interfaces allow the callbacks.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static interface  API.GetDevicesCallback
      This interface is used for the callback of the route GET /devices which get the devices
      static interface  API.GetMenuCallback
      This interface is used for the callback of the route GET /menu which get the menu
      static interface  API.GetQueuesCallback
      This interface is used for the callback of the route GET /queues which gets queues
      static interface  API.GetTicketCallback
      This interface is used for the callback of the route GET /queues/:queue_id/tickets/:user_id which asks the API for the tickets of a given user in a given queue
      static interface  API.GetUsersCallback
      This interface is used for the callback of the route GET /users which get the users
      static interface  API.QueueUpdaterCallback
      This interface is used for the callback of the route PUT /queues/:queue_id/tickets/:user_id which updates a queue
      static interface  API.RegisterQueueCallback
      This interface is used for the callback of the route POST /queues which register a new queue
      static interface  API.SecondFactorCallback
      This interface is used for the callback of second factor answer's url
      static interface  API.TicketGeneratorCallback
      This interface is used for the callback of the route POST queues/:queue_id/tickets which generates a ticket in a queue
      static interface  API.TicketUpdaterCallback
      This interface is used for the callback of the route PUT queues/:queue_id/tickets/:user_id which updates a ticket in a queue
      static interface  API.TokenCheckerCallback
      This interface is used for the callback of the route GET /status/token which checks if the JWT token saved in the device is valid
      static interface  API.TokenGetterCallback
      This interface is used for the callback of the route POST /clients/token which asks the API for a new JWT token

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int checkTokenCounter
      Check token counter so that the calls between the GetToken and the CheckToken methods won't be infinite.
      static java.lang.String TAG
      Tag for debugging purposes

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void checkToken(android.content.Context context, API.TokenCheckerCallback callback)
      This method makes a HTTP request to the API to check if the JWT token saved in the device (if there is any) is a valid token.
      static void generateTicket(org.json.JSONObject params, java.lang.String queueId, android.content.Context context, API.TicketGeneratorCallback callback)
      This method makes an HTTP request to the API to allocate a ticket in a queue.

      This method makes an HTTP request to the API to get the devices Route: GET /devices

      This method makes an HTTP request to the API to get the menu Route: GET /menu
      static void getQueues(android.content.Context context, org.json.JSONObject urlParams, API.GetQueuesCallback callback)
      This method makes an HTTP request to the API to get queues.
      static void getTicket(java.lang.String queueId, java.lang.String userId, android.content.Context context, API.GetTicketCallback callback)
      This method asks the API for the tickets of a given user in a given queue Route: GET /queues/:queue_id/tickets/:user_id
      static void getTicketsFromQueue(android.content.Context context, java.lang.String queue_id, java.lang.String tolerance, java.lang.Boolean useTolerance, API.GetTicketCallback callback)
      This method makes an HTTP request to the API to get the tickets in a given queue.
      static void getToken(android.content.Context context, java.lang.String email, java.lang.String password, API.TokenGetterCallback callback)
      This method makes an HTTP request to the API to ask for a new JWT token.
      static void getUserPhoto(android.content.Context context, java.lang.String url, com.android.volley.toolbox.NetworkImageView networkImageView)
      This method makes an HTTP request to the SIGA's system to get the user's photo.
      static void getUsers(android.content.Context context, API.GetUsersCallback callback)
      This method makes an HTTP request to the API to get the users Route: GET /users
      static void registerQueue(org.json.JSONObject params, android.content.Context context, API.RegisterQueueCallback callback)
      This method makes an HTTP request to the API to search for a ticket in a queue.
      static void secondFactor(android.content.Context context, java.lang.String url, API.SecondFactorCallback callback)
      This method makes an HTTP request to the API to the url sent via push message to do the second factor authorization.

      This method makes an HTTP request to the API to update a queue.

      This method makes an HTTP request to the API to update a ticket in a queue.

    • Field Detail

      • checkTokenCounter

        public static int checkTokenCounter
        Check token counter so that the calls between the GetToken and the CheckToken methods won't be infinite.

      • TAG

        public static java.lang.String TAG
        Tag for debugging purposes

      • API

        public API()

    • Method Detail

      • checkToken

        public static void checkToken(android.content.Context context,
                              API.TokenCheckerCallback callback)
        This method makes a HTTP request to the API to check if the JWT token saved in the device (if there is any) is a valid token. Route: GET /status/token.
        Parameters:
        context - the context of the application
        callback - the TokenCheckerCallback interface that allows other methods to call this method and get its results

      • getToken

        public static void getToken(android.content.Context context,
                            java.lang.String email,
                            java.lang.String password,
                            API.TokenGetterCallback callback)
        This method makes an HTTP request to the API to ask for a new JWT token. Route: POST /clients/token
        Parameters:
        context - the context of the application
        callback - the TokenGetterCallback interface that allows other methods to call this method and get its results
        email - user's e-mail
        password - user's password

      • getTicket

        public static void getTicket(java.lang.String queueId,
                             java.lang.String userId,
                             android.content.Context context,
                             API.GetTicketCallback callback)
        This method asks the API for the tickets of a given user in a given queue Route: GET /queues/:queue_id/tickets/:user_id
        Parameters:
        queueId - the queue id in which the tickets are
        userId - the user id whose tickets are being looked for
        context - the context of the application
        callback - the GetTicketCallback interface that allows other methods to call this method and get its results

      • registerQueue

        public static void registerQueue(org.json.JSONObject params,
                                 android.content.Context context,
                                 API.RegisterQueueCallback callback)
        This method makes an HTTP request to the API to search for a ticket in a queue. Route: POST /queues
        Parameters:
        params - the params gotten from the interface to be sent in the body of the request
        context - the context of the application
        callback - the RegisterQueueCallback interface that allows other methods to call this method and get its results

      • getQueues

        public static void getQueues(android.content.Context context,
                             org.json.JSONObject urlParams,
                             API.GetQueuesCallback callback)
        This method makes an HTTP request to the API to get queues. Route: GET /queues
        Parameters:
        context - the context of the application
        urlParams - the params of the URL
        callback - the GetQueuesCallback interface that allows other methods to call this method and get its results

      • getTicketsFromQueue

        public static void getTicketsFromQueue(android.content.Context context,
                                       java.lang.String queue_id,
                                       java.lang.String tolerance,
                                       java.lang.Boolean useTolerance,
                                       API.GetTicketCallback callback)
        This method makes an HTTP request to the API to get the tickets in a given queue. The response might be restricted to the tolerance value Route: GET /queues/:queue_id/tickets
        Parameters:
        context - the context of the application
        queue_id - the queue id from which the tickets are going to be gotten
        tolerance - the tolerance value
        useTolerance - the boolean that defines if the tolerance is going to be used
        callback - the GetTicketCallback interface that allows other methods to call this method and get its results

      • getUserPhoto

        public static void getUserPhoto(android.content.Context context,
                                java.lang.String url,
                                com.android.volley.toolbox.NetworkImageView networkImageView)
        This method makes an HTTP request to the SIGA's system to get the user's photo.
        Parameters:
        context - the context of the application
        url - the url of the user's photo
        networkImageView - the Volley Network Image View element to set the photo

      • updateTicket

        public static void updateTicket(br.ufrj.ct.ruadmin.Ticket.statusEnum newStatus,
                                android.content.Context context,
                                Ticket ticket,
                                API.TicketUpdaterCallback callback)
        This method makes an HTTP request to the API to update a ticket in a queue. Route: PUT queues/:queue_id/tickets/:user_id
        Parameters:
        newStatus - the new status of the ticket
        context - the context of the application
        ticket - the ticket object to be updated
        callback - the TicketUpdaterCallback interface that allows other methods to call this method and get its results

      • generateTicket

        public static void generateTicket(org.json.JSONObject params,
                                  java.lang.String queueId,
                                  android.content.Context context,
                                  API.TicketGeneratorCallback callback)
        This method makes an HTTP request to the API to allocate a ticket in a queue. Route: POST queues/:queue_id
        Parameters:
        params - the params gotten from the interface to be sent in the body of the request
        queueId - the queue id which the ticket is going to be allocated in
        context - the context of the application
        callback - the TicketGeneratorCallback interface that allows other methods to call this method and get its results

      • updateQueue

        public static void updateQueue(android.content.Context context,
                               org.json.JSONObject params,
                               java.lang.String queue_id,
                               API.QueueUpdaterCallback callback)
        This method makes an HTTP request to the API to update a queue. Route: PUT /queues/:queue_id/tickets/:user_id
        Parameters:
        context - the context of the application
        callback - the TicketUpdaterCallback interface that allows other methods to call this method and get its results

      • secondFactor

        public static void secondFactor(android.content.Context context,
                                java.lang.String url,
                                API.SecondFactorCallback callback)
        This method makes an HTTP request to the API to the url sent via push message to do the second factor authorization.
        Parameters:
        context - the context of the application
        url - the url sent via push message
        callback - the SecondFactorCallback interface that allows other methods to call this method and get its results
